title: Progression Models in Resistance Training for Healthy Adults (ACSM Position Stand)
authors: Kraemer WJ; Adams K; Cafarelli E; Dudley GA; Dooly C; Feigenbaum MS; Fleck SJ; Franklin B; Fry AC; Hoffman JR; Newton RU; Potteiger J; Ratamess NA; et al.

outcomes.primary_human: hypothetical training_effects (strength; hypertrophy; power; endurance – guidance only)

notes: Key ACSM RT position stand outlining progression models for novice, intermediate, advanced, and elite healthy adults; recommends multi-set training, specific %1RM/repetition ranges, periodized progression, and higher volumes/frequencies for advanced trainees—this is the document critiqued by Carpinelli (110, 108).
